pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister Gaston Browne of Antigua and Barbuda | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with Prime Minister Gaston Browne of Antigua and Barbuda.

Prime Minister Trudeau expressed his deepest sympathies to those affected by the recent tropical storms, including Hurricane Irma, in Antigua and Barbuda and the Caribbean region. The leaders discussed the longstanding and positive bilateral relations that exist between the two countries.

Prime Minister Trudeau also offered Canadian assistance for response and recovery efforts in Antigua and Barbuda, while highlighting current measures being undertaken in the country and region.
